author: Stephanie Yang
title: 'My World Collapsed With a Bang': How Coronavirus Ravaged a Family...
description: A Lunar New Year dinner left six family members infected; a hallmark of the virus is the way it has spread within families
content:
The last message Li Song received from her husband was a hand emoji of the OK sign, assuring her that he was on the mend after being hospitalized with pneumonia.
Four hours later, the hospital called to tell her he had died.
Ms. Li, 53, had spent days scram… [+94 chars]
